org.cougaar.lib.web.engine
Interface ServletEngine

All Known Subinterfaces:
ServletEngineService
public interface ServletEngine

A servlet engine, as used by the ServletEngineRegistryService.

See Also:
ServletEngineService

Method Detail

setGateway

void setGateway(javax.servlet.Servlet s)
                throws javax.servlet.ServletException
Set the single "gateway" servlet that will handle all client requests.

Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException

getNamingEntries

java.util.Map getNamingEntries()
Get the naming service URIs for this servlet engine.

For example:

    "http"  -> "http://myhost:80/"
    "https" -> "http://myhost:443/cougaar"

Returns:
a Map of String to URIs that should be advertised in the naming service. This map will be advertised for every local agent.
